vlive.korean: 창밖의 소음들이 거슬리네 더욱더 그렇지 맞아 맞네! The sounds outside are unpleasant... It's like that, right! 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] MOONBYUL's Weird Day Vlog #2
vlive.english: The sounds outside are unpleasant... It's like that, right!

vlive.korean: 더욱 맛있습니다 - 근데 다 명란 맛밖에 없어? It tastes better. - There's only one flavor? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.5
vlive.english: It tastes better. - There's only one flavor?

vlive.korean: 더욱더 생각하면서 - 맞아 나도 다시... Let's think more about that. - Right, I will also... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SPECIAL VIDEO] SEVENTEEN NEW RINGS CEREMONY💍
vlive.english: Let's think more about that. - Right, I will also...

vlive.korean: 앞으로 더욱더 열심히 활동하는 지훈이가 되도록 하겠습니다! and I will be Jihoon that works harder from now on. 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : [Wink Arcade] 2019 SOBA AWARDS Lv.17
vlive.english: and I will be Jihoon that works harder from now on.

vlive.korean: [더욱 멋진 모습으로 돌아올게요~!] [AB6IX 1st 팬미팅, 모두 수고했어요!] [We'll be back with better things!] [Great job everyone!] View video AB6IX : [예삐소드] AB6IX (에이비식스) 1ST FANMEETING BEHIND IN THAILAND
vlive.english: [We'll be back with better things!] [Great job everyone!]

examples.korean: As he pushed her, she swung higher and higher. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 (그네를 탄) 그녀를 밀어주자 그녀는 더욱 더 높이 올라갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: As he pushed her, she swung higher and higher. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Things have gone from bad to worse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사정이 (안 좋던 것에서) 더욱 더 악화되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: I love him more with each passing day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 날이 갈수록 그를 더욱 더 사랑하게 된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: As time went on he grew more and more impatient. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 시간이 흐를수록 그는 더욱 더 조급해졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
